name: Christtube LLC
tag_list: christian, christ, god, social-media, social-network, religion, church
overview:
Christtube.com will be the first true “Social Network” community for Christians; serving the highly untapped Christian market is highly underserved and untapped with evidence of 82 million daily searches for religious information; 190 million Google searches for God, 130 million Google searches for the word Jesus and 110 million Google searches for the term Christian. Christians represent a demographic of people with $367 Billion Annual Buying Power and $5.3 Trillion Annual Income.

CHRISTTUBE.com will be the internetâ€™s first full service Christian website designed for communities, services, and networking ministries.

The CHRISTTUBE User Community: Individuals / Clergy / Denominational Organizations / Non-Profits / Ministry Conferences & Events / Media / Entertainers / Authors / Christian Businesses

CHRISTTUBE.com is designed with a virtual platform for Christians to express their faith powered by Web 2.0 technologies which allow members to quickly connect to the services and features that are utilized in the everyday virtual experience in a single Christian based portal.

Features & Services: Communities & Groups / Social Networking / Messaging / Web Meetings / Streaming Services / User-Generated Content / Webcasting / Podcasting / Blogs / Chats / Forums / Video / Chat /E-mail / Prayer / On-Demand / Pay-Per-View / Live / e-Commerce / Marketing & Advertising / e-Books / Music

The BRANDING of CHRISTTUBE is concise and clear about whom it is designed for with a TAILORED CHRISTIAN BASED CONTENT that allows Christians a focused environment in which to network
and expand their faith and understanding.
